item.description:
If you didn’t get enough of Providence Craft Beer Week at the Beermuda Triangle meet-up, or if Thursdays are just better for you, let’s meet at Scürvy Dög at 1718 Westminster Street (www.scurvydogbar.com) at 6:00. They are promoting Cisco Brewers out of Nantucket, makers of Whale’s Tale Pale Ale, one of my current favorites.

I will not be staying late because Friday is a long day for me, but you all are welcome to continue the event as long as you please. The Scurvy gets quite a diverse and entertaining crowd later in the evening.

Providence’s most eclectic bar celebrates Elvis, vinyl, the Day of the Dead, punk, great beer, and good times. What better place to wrap up Providence Craft Beer Week and prepare for the P-Collective Anniversary meet-up.

See you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Bruce is hosting this one, please look at his picture!
item.name: Scürvy Dög - Cisco Brewers for Providence Craft Beer Week
